name: Thesis Accomplishment
detail: I'm thrilled to announce that my thesis report has been signed by my amazing supervisor, Shafayet Nur, sir. Special appreciation goes to my incredible thesis partner, Jobair Shakib, whose collaboration and late-night discussions shaped this project. To my batch mates and friends, your encouragement and unwavering support have made this academic journey truly memorable. Let's celebrate this achievement together!

detail: Web development is difficult, only then it is fun to do. You just have to set your standards. If it were to be easy, would anyone do it?

name: Toughest things about being a web developer
detail: Web development in 2023 is not as easy to break into as it once was. Low-cost outsourcing is more prevalent, making it difficult for freelancers and web development agencies to secure long-term agreements. Competition for jobs, especially for new graduates, is tougher than ever. Web developers often face sleepless nights and immense stress due to demanding projects and tight deadlines. The constant need to learn new skills and adapt to changing technologies adds to the challenges. Communication issues between developers and non-developers can lead to dissatisfaction. Despite the difficulties, web development remains a challenging profession, requiring resilience and continuous growth.
